text_block_list.text: Nice job, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I still couldn't bring back a first-place finish.
You gave it everything you had though. It was a good race.
You gave it everything you had though. It was a good race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I have to tell you something… It's about me, I can't…
You can't do that dash you used to do… Right?
You can't do that dash you used to do… Right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You knew?
Not until your race just now. I saw it in how hard you fought.
Not until your race just now. I saw it in how hard you fought.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I just don't get it…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: My instincts are off somehow, so I can't run like I used to.
Due to her injury, her senses have been thrown off.

It's affected her form and even led to the tragedy of losing her 
powerful dash.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I should've told you. But I thought if I did, you'd make me quit.
You're right, I might have.
You're right, I might have.

But things are different now. Even if you can't run like before, you 
haven't changed.

But things are different now. Even if you can't run like before, you 
haven't changed.

You want to win so badly, you'll push through anything. The Narita 
Brian who first captivated me is still right here.

You want to win so badly, you'll push through anything. The Narita 
Brian who first captivated me is still right here.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's like my big sis said—you really do put your racers first.
choice_data_list: I'm with you to the end!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Good… Then I'll keep on running!

Brian's next race is the Hanshin Daishoten. But how do we get her to 
victory…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, so this's where you've been! I finished warming up!
Oh, sorry. I was thinking about what to do for Brian's training.

I need to figure out a completely new way of running for her that can 
draw out all her power.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Sounds pretty tough.

There's no time for trial and error, so I was wondering how we could 
train smarter.

There's no time for trial and error, so I was wondering how we could 
train smarter.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ummm, arrrrgh… Yeah, smarter, but… If only I had the smarts to think 
like thaaat!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I thought it was you, Ticket. I can hear your voice from a furlong 
away.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Here we go, Trainer! Someone with a big head FULL of smarts!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hey! I keep telling you my head is NOT big… Wait, what are you talking about?
Right, an intellect like hers might be perfect!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wait, what is this all about?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What a merry bunch. I heard Brian's next race is set, so I made some 
rice balls to give her a boost.
Wow! Now we've even got the competition on our side!
Wow! Now we've even got the competition on our side!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? You wanna go one-on-one or somethin'?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: First Big Sis, now Amazon?

I asked Hayahide to help me think up ways to train and run that'd 
best suit you now.
And we needed the help of someone who knows you, so who better than your competition?
And we needed the help of someone who knows you, so who better than your competition?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's right. Just let ol' Hishiama fix what ails!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
A logistical approach may not be the best for a natural-born runner 
such as yourself, but I'm sure it'll prove more beneficial than running 
blindly.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'd hate to lose our little sibling rivalry, so we must get you back to 
your old self—no, we must make you better than ever before.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh, I'll take whatever scraps I can.
All right! Time to carve a path to victory!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I watched your training with Hayahide—what a show! A month of that, 
and your quads will be JACKED!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
She's the class nerd and jock combined into one person. No wonder 
her regimen is so effective.
You must be proud to be her sister.
You must be proud to be her sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I am.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You two may be different, but you know each other's racing styles so 
well and were both Racers of the Year. You're indispensable to one 
another.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh, right! They're gonna announce the URA awards soon, huh?
It should be on TV. I'll turn it on.
It should be on TV. I'll turn it on.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
This racer topped Narita Brian's record at the Kikuka Sho and went on 
to win the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Her sky-high success can't be stopped, so that's why Mayano Top 
Gun has been chosen as Racer of the Year!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, uh, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Everyone knows you had a fantastic year, but what are your hopes for 
what comes next?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
My hopes are the same as everyone watching—to give an ace 
performance in a mach-speed race!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Then we'll know to keep expecting big things out of you.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Now, are there any opponents out there that get you excited to race?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yes! Uh-huh! There is! Someone just like that!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Her run in last year's Hanshin Daishoten was so amazing!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Every one of these races is the same old thing…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Awww, this doesn't get my jets burning! I should've gone back to the 
academy instead of coming here.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She's blasted ahead! Brian's lead is only growing now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whoa, no way! After all that, she's taking off even faster?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's unchallenged—no one can catch up to her six—no, seven-length 
lead! And that's the finish!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wooow… Unreal!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
That really gave me a rush. I knew I had to run against her in a 
supersonic race like that!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But she got injured and started losing races afterward…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Still! I knew it when I raced her in the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
The tingly excitement I felt during that race was the same as that day 
I saw her in the Hanshin Daishoten. That's why…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I can't wait to race Narita Brian again!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
A race between the current and former Racers of the Year! That would 
be a sight to behold!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She requested you specifically… And she's a winner of the same 
Classic as you, the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I don't care who I race against.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
With all this support, I refuse to let anything—or anyone—get in the 
way of my victory!
choice_data_list: Nothing left to do but win it!
Nothing left to do but win it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah!
